info.name: JEP 408 - Simple Web Server
info.dscr: Command-line tool and API to start a minimal HTTP server for serving static files. Useful for prototyping, testing, and educational purposes.

info.name: JEP 413 - Code Snippets in Java API Documentation
info.dscr: Introduces the @snippet tag for JavaDoc to simplify the inclusion of example source code in API documentation.

name: Reimplement Core Reflection with Method Handles
text: An internal reimplementation of Core Reflection to use method handles, unifying the platform's reflective mechanisms. This change improves performance for constant-folded reflection calls and reduces JDK maintenance costs.

info.name: Internet-Address Resolution SPI
info.dscr: Defines a service-provider interface (SPI) for host name and address resolution, allowing `java.net.InetAddress` to use custom resolvers.

info.name: JEP 419 - Foreign Function & Memory API (Second Incubator)
JEP 420 - Pattern Matching for switch (Second Preview)
info.dscr: The second preview of Pattern Matching for switch. The final implementation is in JEP 441.

info.name: JEP 421 - Deprecate Finalization for Removal
info.dscr: Deprecates the finalization mechanism for removal in a future release due to its inherent flaws.
